name: Paisavania
description:
You are a paisa arriero lost in the mountains trying to get back home safely using your trusty machete. Get health boosts and abilities like dash (You need to unlock this ability after beating a challenge) and double jump

Use keys: 

Z to jump,  X to attack and C to dash ().

A D or left and right arrows to move.

ESC to pause and Enter to select

It is an early project that needs a lot of work.

Thanks for playing <3
